page.title: 05TRADE-SHOPS AND POST OFFICES
page.content: There are three shops in our area and two of them are Post Offices.They sell food,pencils,pop,ice cream,jumpers, vegetables and even gardening equipment.They open at nine o'clock and close at half past five in the afternoon.There are two in the { {Wynnstay}and one in {Bont}.One post office is not far from the school.There is one shop near the post office and we call it the {Emporium} and it is owned by Mr.Cecil Evens.He also sells coal and calor gas.There are three garages in our area;{ {R'Efail,Central Garage and Station {Garage.Station Garage}also sells new and used cars.We also have an electrician,builder,stonemason and carpenter living within the area.
